title: Can't submit results for my tournament?
body:
I ran event ID 102064 and now I need to submit results, but the Summoner names aren't being kept. I would add a player and then go to the next field and the first name would be deleted.

I created a support ticket 15 days ago, and it still sits there, open and unanswered. So here I am, hoping that the Support Board can be of more assistance than Riot Support itself.

I have tried 3 browsers and I get the same problem.

replies.body:
Hey,

Can you provide anymore information about the issue you are experiencing?

Have all the summoners your are trying to prize out to registered for your event?

> [{quoted}](name=Maraudaur,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=bt1LAuAx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-13T03:14:42.661+0000)
>
> Hey,
> 
> Can you provide anymore information about the issue you are experiencing?
> 
> Have all the summoners your are trying to prize out to registered for your event?

They have to be registered on the event that was on events.oce.leagueoflegends.com??

That's correct, its all in the FAQ http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/content/faq

If you haven't done this please email  OCEEvents@riotgames.com and we will try get that sorted out for you.
